reviewPeople.content: I had a positive interaction with Homeocare International Pvt Ltd, a clinic with doctors and physiotherapists. The business was well-supervised and I received good care.

reviewPeople.title: Overpriced
reviewPeople.content: The recovery process was very slow and the treatments were overpriced. Monthly wise payment option is not there. They are taken full amount from me within first 2 or 3 months before complet the course. I had taken 10month medicine from there by 4 instalment. Asper doctor I have to take another 10month medicine, but there accountant said now you have to pay 16,000/- at a time. I request him give me monthly wise payment option. So I can easily take medicine but he disagree with me.

reviewPeople.title: Poor Service
reviewPeople.content: Very poor service, Medicine Didn`t Work

reviewPeople.title: Excellent Experience
reviewPeople.content: I recently had the opportunity to visit Homeocare International Pvt Ltd and I must say that my experience was nothing short of excellent. From the moment I walked in, the staff was warm and welcoming, and made me feel right at home. The hospital itself was clean and well-maintained, with a peaceful and calming ambiance that helped put me at ease. The waiting area was comfortable and well-equipped with amenities to ensure the comfort of patients and their families. The doctors and staff at Homeocare International Pvt Ltd were highly professional and knowledgeable, and provided me with exceptional care and attention throughout my visit.

reviewPeople.title: Good Service
reviewPeople.content: The best doctor`s, best equipment, good service, good in hospitality. After spine surgery from Dr ..., my dad is able to walk properly and without pain. A big thanks to the doctor and his entire team supporting the patients to their best. thanks u so much sir 💖😘

reviewPeople.title: Wonderful Doctor
reviewPeople.content: My daughter is taking treatment from life force since 2yrs . Dr. Vinay is such a wonderful Dr and you always make me my daughter feel so safe. Thank you for being the best doctor for my daughter. And you are a perfect combination of responsibility and care, all of them was very helpful and supportive, My daughter getting very good relief. Now she stopped steroids also & taking only life force medicines. Thank you life force Malleswaram team & Dr. Rajesh shah.

reviewPeople.content: I had taken my pet cat for a blood test, the doctor was on the call throughout the procedure and while transferring the blood to the test tube he spilt it on the floor and had to redo it which was clumsy and not professional.

reviewPeople.title: Wrong Diagnosis
reviewPeople.content: My 3 year gsd dog had lost front leg amputated in some other hospital because of the wrong diagnosis and treatment by doctor gowtam and staff Harsha. At Reenee when we took the dog for leg sprain, they took xray of my dog leg and put a tight bandage that literally stopped blood supply to the leg and within 1.5 days the leg started decaying...We have to get its leg amputated as we got the reply that leg amputation was the only option from the best 3-4 pet surgeons.
